there's a scene in neverending
nightmares where you stab something

sometimes like I would dwell on their

hey this is something I've dealt with
they lost their control over me which is

transitioning as a trans woman the

therapy and of being trans in the world
for me was characterized by frustration
by failure the idea that the rules are

and that's really what I wanted to do
with dysphoria setting a goal making it

on hormone replacement therapy I wasn't
documenting my experience for a

why made the game for the endings are

every day of your life you're not

you're just playing a video game but I
wonder if making this video game has
